name: TimeCamp
who_it_helps: Small crews that need simple job-costed time tracking tied to payroll and billing.

name: Connecteam
who_it_helps: Owners who want an all-in-one app for scheduling, time clocks, tasks and crew communication.

name: WebHR
who_it_helps: Small businesses that want HR records, leave tracking and payroll in one cloud system.

name: Lano
who_it_helps: US and EU companies hiring contractors or employees in multiple countries and currencies.

name: Tyms / Adam (AI Accountant)
role: AI-powered accounting and bookkeeping assistant for small businesses and crews
